room_title: Escape room "The Space Station" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: This was my first escape room experience, and I had a really good time.  I would definitely go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Space Station" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: My sister and 15 yr old niece came up from Los Angeles to visit and we took them here on a Friday night.  Great time for all of us.  We didn't escape but had a blast.  My niece couldn't stop talking about how fun it was and wants to go back as soon as she can.  Thank you to the ladies running the experience. Great times!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Space Station" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: What a great experience we had with a group of others we met at escape room. The challenges we were tasked at solving were age appropriate, anxiety provoking (in a good way) and of course a lot of fun. You have ample opportunity to try to solve problems and help is readily available by phone. Most of all, it's fairly affordable at about $35 a person. Will definitely do this again!
